Text.content:
In version 12, OpenCms introduces a JSON API. With the JSON API, OpenCms is no longer just a content management system for building websites, but also a management system for mobile application content. Mobile applications typically provide a combination of useful features but also up-to-date information. Areas with information change regularly and contribute to mobile applications being used more often.

When content changes, it is obviously desirable not to have to publish a new version of an application every time. Rather, it should be possible to always retrieve news items that are up-to-date via a content management system. The presentation and formatting should also be variably adaptable by an editorial team according to the actual content.

The JSON API of is a service interface for content in mobile applications. Editorial teams can use it to create formatted content for mobile applications and publish it on a scheduled basis, without the need for an additional mobile editorial system.
